data.text: “We humans are very frail.
We disappear quickly, like flowers that grow from the ground quickly and then wither and die [SIM].
Yahweh, why do you keep watching me to see if I am doing something that is wrong [RHQ]?
People are sinners from the time when they are born;
You have decided how long our lives will be.
So please stop examining us, and allow us to be alone,
If someone cuts a tree down,
Its roots in the ground may be very old,
but if some water falls on it,
But when we people lose all our strength and die,
Just like water evaporates from the ocean,
people lie down and die and do not get up again.
“Yahweh, I wish that you would put me safely in the place of the dead and forget about me
When we humans die, we will certainly not live again [RHQ].
You would call me, and I would answer.
You would take care of [MET] me,
It is as though the record of my sins would be sealed in a small bag,
“But, just like mountains crumble and rocks fall down from a cliff,
and just like water slowly wears away the stones, and just like floods wash away soil,
You always defeat us, and then we die [EUP].
When we die we do not know if our sons will grow up and do things that will cause them to be honored.
We will feel our own pains; we will not feel anything else;
